scripts.release-dev: yarn fetch-tags && git tag -m 'Current DEV environment'   -a -f DEV  && yarn push-tags
scripts.release-test: yarn fetch-tags && git tag -m 'Current TEST environment' -a -f TEST && yarn push-tags
scripts.release-qa: yarn fetch-tags && git tag -m 'Current QA environment'     -a -f QA   && yarn push-tags
scripts.release-prod: yarn fetch-tags && git tag -m 'Current PROD environment' -a -f PROD && yarn push-tags
scripts.push-tags: git push origin --tags -f && echo Check status: https://console.radix.equinor.com/applications/vsm/jobs
scripts.run-dev: docker build -t equinor-flyt . && docker run -p 3000:3000 --env-file ./environment-variables/DEV.env equinor-flyt
scripts.run-test: docker build -t equinor-flyt . && docker run -p 3000:3000 --env-file ./environment-variables/TEST.env equinor-flyt
scripts.run-qa: docker build -t equinor-flyt . && docker run -p 3000:3000 --env-file ./environment-variables/QA.env equinor-flyt
scripts.run-prod: docker build -t equinor-flyt . && docker run -p 3000:3000 --env-file ./environment-variables/PROD.env equinor-flyt
